roleset.name: cause injury
roleset.note: WOUND-V NOTES: As usual, use arg2 only when arg0 is also present. (from wound.01-v)
WOUNDED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from wounded.01-j)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Recently, in Wollo province in the center of Ethiopia, Tigrean forces have killed, wounded and captured an additional 20,000 government troops.
example.arg: in Wollo province in the center of Ethiopia

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: He ordered people to make an idol to honor the first beast , the one that was wounded by the sword but did not die .
